oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Man's brocaded silk vest
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The vest has a cotton lining and the silk has deteriorated badly. According to family history, a West Tennessee landowner named Herndon was hanged in this vest. With an attack impending, he sent his family in one direction while he fled in the other direction. He was captured and hanged. A rescue party arrived too late to save him.
